I do not know why I bother to type this, since you did not read the information already provided. Yes. This will work with the FLT release. It is actually designed for that.

And on another note, it is sad to see Skidrow dissing FLT for their crack method. But at least they were relatively kind about it. FLT may have rushed to be first. And they may have missed a few things. 

But the scene is about helping people avoid paying an unfair price for inferior products. So please keep things civil and be respectful.

As always, once you see that you like the game, make the arrangements you need to in order to purchase it. If no-one buys the games, they have no motivation to make more.
